overview: Guy Alon Eliav is the CEO of blogTV. Prior to blogTV he served as Tapuz’s (http://www.tapuz.co.il) CEO. Entering Tapuz just prior to the dot.com crisis, he led several key strategic processes, focusing on developing its core capabilities in the field of online communities and User Generated Content. Guy led Tapuz’s IPO in Tel Aviv Stock Exchange in March 2006. Guy is a Certified Public Accountant and holds a B.A in accounting from Tel Aviv University and an Executive MBA from Tel Aviv University.
